full_title: Postcards from Paradise by Ringo Starr
name: Postcards from Paradise

songs.full_title: Rory and the Hurricanes by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Rory and the Hurricanes
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Wake up early heading for the M1
200 miles till we get to London
We were sleeping on the floor
Living on bread and jam

Because we thought we'd hit the big time
We didn't give a damn

[Chorus]
We were Rory and the Hurricanes
Rory and the Hurricanes
Rory and the Hurricanes
Rory and the Hurricanes
Rory and the Hurricanes

[Verse 2]
Went to dance
On a Friday night
Every London girl we asked
Was so uptight

I saw a pretty little girl
She came from France
She said "Oui"
When I asked her to dance

The world was spinning
Like the glitter ball above
...and already I was falling in love

[Chorus]
We were Rory and the Hurricanes
Rory and the Hurricanes
We were Rory and the Hurricanes

[Bridge]
Going down to 'Soho'
Was the place you had to go
It's where everyone was made
Down to the Two Eye Cafe
That's where Tommy Steele would play

[Verse 3]
Next time we went to London Town
We didn't (do) much hanging around
I was with you know who
I played the drums like I always do

[Chorus]
We were Rory and the Hurricanes
Rory and the Hurricanes
Rory and the Hurricanes
Rory and the Hurricanes

songs.full_title: You Bring The Party Down by Ringo Starr
songs.title: You Bring The Party Down
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I woke up this morning and opened up my eyes
I made myself some coffee and then I realized
Some people are good some people are bad
Some people are crazy and some are still so sad
When you're in town
You bring the party down

[Verse 2]
The times are changing but you don't understand
Still living off your memories when you were in the band
You're loaded up on this you're loaded up on that
Your mind is just so twisted you don't know where you're at
When you make that sound
You bring the party down

[Pre-Chorus]
I tried to help you time and time again
I thought you'd listen to me your dear old friend

[Chorus]
I tried my best I did what I can
You never listened you just don't understand
When you're around
You bring the party down

[Instrumental]

[Chorus]

[Outro]
When you're around
You bring the party down

songs.title: Bridges
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Each and every road is filled with choices
Have to decide which way to go
You can say where are you at
Turn around or go back
Or take a chance on what’s ahead
You never know

Down every road you come to bridges
Some are crossed and some get banned
And some you can get down
And new ones get built from what we learned

[Chorus]
Down every road we come to bridges
Crossing bridges is the best way to go
Down every road you come to bridges
Crossing bridges is the best way to go

[Verse 2]
Come a long way
From where I started
Still got a long way to go
I still got some things that need answers
But this much I know
This much I know

[Hook]
If where are you know isn’t working
Crossing bridges is the best way to go
Crossing bridges is the best way to go

[Instrumental]

[Chorus]

[Instrumental]

songs.full_title: Postcards from Paradise by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Postcards from Paradise
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I searched here, there and everywhere
Until I saw you standing there
I am the greatest fan of you
And love is all I've got to do
It's all too much my little child
If you will be my honey pie
Eight days a week you will be mine
And getting better all the time
I'm begging you don't pass me by
And if you do please tell me why
I know you told me yesterday
You've got to hide your love away
But if your honey is bad to me
It told me "love and let it be"

[Chorus]
Postcards from Paradise
With all my love and I'll be true
Postcards from Paradise
As ever P.S. I love you
Postcards from Paradise

[Verse 2]
I would not treat you for no one
I see your face here comes the sun
And I am going nowhere man
Because I want to hold your hand
It's like I said the night before
I'll love you when I'm sixty four

[Chorus]
Postcards from Paradise
With all my love and I'll be true
Postcards from Paradise
As ever P.S. I love you
Postcards from Paradise

[GUITAR SOLO]

[Bridge]
I know that we can work it out
There ain't no need of twist and shout
And I won't back off boogaloo
Unless you say you love me do

[Chorus]
Postcards from Paradise
With all my love and I'll be true
Postcards from Paradise
As ever P.S. I love you
Postcards from Paradise
Postcards from Paradise
With all my love and I'll be true
Postcards from Paradise
As ever P.S. I love you
Postcards from Paradise

songs.full_title: Right Side Of The Road by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Right Side Of The Road
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Be what you’re doing
Stop what you do
The only one you’re fooling
Isn’t me it’s you
Didn’t I try to tell you?
You carry in a much too heavy note

[Chorus 1]
You’re on the right side of the wrong side of the road

[Verse 2]
Aiming for disaster
Something’s got to change
You’re only moving faster
Almost out of range
It isn’t about direction
Until you got no place left to go
No ,no,no

[Chorus 1]

[Bridge]
Somebody already told me
What I’m telling you
I won’t ask anybody who knows me
I believe you can do it too

[Instrumental]

[Verse 3]
Tell me are you open
To be turned around?
You never really too much to be found
Maybe choose another direction
You got so many ways to go

[Chorus 2](x2)
Try on the right side on the right side of the road

songs.full_title: Not Looking Back by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Not Looking Back
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Memory after memory runs through my mind
You standing in every picture
After all this time
Where will we go from here
Still together after all these years

[Chorus]
Summers have come and gone
But all love goes on and on
You could ask for more than that
I’m looking forward
Not looking back

[Verse 2]
Can hardly wait for the days that are coming down
And when they will lead us into places
No one else has found
And I promise you
I’ll love you for a thousand years

[Chorus]

[Bridge]
Day after day
What else could I say?
But I love you

[Instrumental]

[Verse 3]
No regrets just respect for all that we’ve done right
From where I stand
Our future still looking bright
Where will we go from here?
Still together after all these years

[Chorus]

[Hook](x2)
Not looking back

songs.title: Bamboula
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
On an old cot bay from around the lake
My baby said to me
This ain’t no time
For any nickel and dime
Or a wasted memory
So you all gather round and about the town
And it sounds like history
And our rhythm is great
It’s on the way
That brought you back to me

He cool you
Can't fool you, Bamboula

Down in Congo square
Not so long ago
A creole beat would play
And an old court room in a big bad moon
Would dine on end
The days go rumble in a mumble jumbo way
Sweet heart dear whit her hear real
You play each day

I’m calling
You owe it
You all in

[Instrumental]

Bamboula

With a creole girl
And a cranberry lane
Taking all my breath away
With every little age delayed
Feeling also

There’s no time to hesitate
Let us keep it straight
Never separate
This is not to intervene

Engagin’ the raging
It’s cagin’
Engagin’ the raging
It’s cagin’

I’m calling
You all in
I’m calling
You all in
I’m calling
You all in

songs.full_title: Island In The Sun by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Island In The Sun
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Is not what you got
It’s what you give
It’s not how you die
It’s how you live
It’s not what you read
It’s what you solve
It’s not what you keep now
It’s what you let go

[Pre-Chorus 1]
Well, Now now easy does it
Make this moment last
Don’t worry about the future
Don’t forget about the past

[Chorus]
It don’t really matter
Where I’ve been
Or what I’ve done
I just keep on searching
For that island in the sun
I’m just searching
For that island in the sun
I’m gonna find my island in the sun

[Verse 2]
No No location
It ain’t on the map
It takes concentration
All into your lap
It ain’t in the whiskey
It ain’t in the drug
It could be a woman with you
Who leads you to love

[Pre-Chorus 2]
Easy does it
Make this moment last
Don’t worry about the future
Don’t forget about the past

[Chorus 2]
Don’t really matter
Where I’ve been
Or what I’ve done
I just keep on searching
For that island in the sun
I’m just searching
For that island in the sun
I’m gonna keep on searching
Island in the sun

[Bridge]
Once upon a time
I couldn’t move without a spliff
Then I wouldn’t stop hiding
I got so much more to give
I got so much more to give
I got so much love to give

[Instrumental]

[Outro]
It don’t really matter
Where I’ve been
Or what I’ve done
I just keep on searching
For my island in the sun
I’m just searching
I’m gonna keep on searching
For that island in the sun
Island in the sun
I got to keep on searching
Island in the sun

songs.full_title: Touch And Go by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Touch And Go
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
We met on a Friday night
I saw some other guy holding you tight
I thought that I didn't stand a chance
I caught your eye at the end of the dance
I knew from the moment we said hello
It had to be more than touch and go
It had to be more than touch and go

[Verse 2]
Let me tell you one more time
I'm so glad that you are mine
This could have been just one more night
Now I'm gonna love you for the rest of my life
It makes me happy to know you know
This is more than touch and go
This is more than touch and go

[Chorus]
I like it when you're around me
I was blessed the moment you found me
From daybreak to dark night
You make everything all right
Because of you I've come to know
This is more than touch and go

[Bridge]
It's so easy to fall in love
But hard to hold on tight enough
I live the life I was dreaming of
Now that I found you

[Verse 3]
What we found as the years go by
Is nothing changes if we don't try
To see each others point of view
And build a love that's deep and true
Sometimes fast and sometimes slow
Everything is touch and go
Life is more than touch and go

[Chorus]

[Outro]
Ever since we said hello
Life is more than touch and go
Life is more than touch and go
Life is more than touch and go

songs.title: Confirmation
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Sometimes I'm up
Sometimes I'm down
Sometimes I'm lost
But sometimes I'm found
I look at you, and I can see
Why I'm still look around
It's clear to me
If I knew then what I know now
I'd do it all again with you anyhow

[Verse 2]
We've been together from the very start
It wasn't easy but we had the heart
We didn't know what we had to go through
I'm just so happy that I did it with you
If I knew then what I know now
I'd do it all again with you anyhow!

[Chorus]
Confirmation, when I look at you
Confirmation, that this think it's true
Confirmation, that we got it right
Confirmation, that you're here tonight!

[Verse 3]
Some people try and make up their mind
But you and I we've known all this time
At the end of the day when the sun goes down
I'm glad to say that we're still around
If I knew then what I know now
I'd do it all again with you anyhow!

[Verse 1]

Confirmation!

Confirmation!

songs.full_title: Let Love Lead by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Let Love Lead
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
When you're feeling stuck in the day to day
Having trouble finding your way
Let love lead, let love lead

When you're all caught up in fear and doubt
And you just can't see your way out
Let love lead, let love lead

[Chorus 1]
By now I know you know
It's going to take you where you need to go
You got to let love lead, let love lead

[Verse 2]
When talking heads talk, but nothing rings true
And every day you're more confused
Let love lead, let love lead

When the troubled world makes no sense
All I know the best defense is to
Let love lead, let love lead

[Chorus 2]
If we're ever going to get somewhere
Only one thing can take us there
Let love lead

[Instrumental]

You got to let love lead

[Verse 3]
When it just comes down to me and you
And we feel we don't know what to do
We've got to let love lead, let love lead

[Outro]
By now we all know
It's going to take us where we need to go
We've got to let love lead (let love lead)
Let (let love) Love Lead (Let Love lead)
Let (Gotta let) Love Lead (Let love lead)
(let love, let love lead)

[Instrumental]
